name: microbiological
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to microbiology (= the study of very small living things such as bacteria): The tissue removed was sent for microbiological analysis. Routine microbiological testing has indicated the presence of salmonella in two products. See
microbiology
More examplesFewer examplesE coli is one of the commonest microbiological organisms on the planet.Clinical and microbiological data were collected by infection prevention and control nurses.She was particularly concerned with microbiological safety.
